import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' export default function Game(props) { const [selected, setSelected] = useState() let data = props.data const saveSelection = (ID) => () => { reset() setSelected(prevSelected => prevSelected + ID) console.log(ID) } function reset() { data = props.randomize(data) } useEffect(() => { }, [selected]) return (
) }
